@jennpops I didn't realise how divisive she was until the La La Land hoopla. I'm just a sucker for her brand of galness.
@jennpops But she STILL manages to be luminous, goddamnit.
@jennpops I keep changing my mind about which dress I like best. Right now: Amy Adams. Also, the make-up is just *kisses fingers*

@msaoife I love the Hollywood covers so much - used to stick them on my wardrobe back in the day. Emma Stone looks so luminous on this one<3
@sweatyuncle Thank you, I will bring all of my husband's other wives along to that.

Unusual to hear the word 'carnage' in a US presidential inauguration. Very dark speech so far.

@LaurenceMackin If I hadn't got the Hamilton tickets I would be v jealous of you right now. Would love to see Ruth Wilson live.
@LaurenceMackin No, that's not the Hamilton way *nerd face*. You going to try getting them on the 30th instead? Good luck!
@gavreilly @aideenblackwood AMAZING. Welcome to the happiest group on Twitter.
@sarkorama Only 13 months to go *mildly hysterical laughter*

@michfreeman @peter_bodkin Mainly because of my gushing. ("It won loads of Tonys, and lots of other awards, and...")
@michfreeman Michael, plz. I just had to explain what it is to @peter_bodkin and it was more awkward than I'd expected.
@gavreilly Any joy? I am crossing everything for you.
@sarkorama Star, thanks a mill. May take you up on that, given the price of those tickets!
@msaoife YASSSSSS. February 2018. Have never booked tickets so far in advance in my life. Did you get them?
The second-best thing about getting Hamilton tickets is seeing all the fellow Hamilton people on Irish Twitter. #HamiltonLDN
@urchinette @msleedy @aoiph @ciaragemmam @ellenmcoyne YAYYYYYY! That's brilliant. And November too!
@Siobhan2culture Thank you, I have worked very hard for this moment.
@CiaraLNorton It feels weird to say well done but... WELL DONE/CONGRATS/YAY! The actual relief and happiness is unreal.
I managed to get tickets for Hamilton and suddenly everything is just that little bit better #HamiltonLDN https://t.co/07uUfgq7k1
@urchinette @aoiph @ciaragemmam @ellenmcoyne Rooting for you with literally every ounce of hope that I have.
@urchinette @ciaragemmam @ellenmcoyne @aoiph I GOT THEM. OH MY GOD. I'm actually dying here. *dies*

@aoiph Whaaaaaaat? Is that possible? There can't be that many people who had the theatre membership.

@PeterMcGuireIE But it was interesting seeing the hands-thrown-up-in-the-air response from some folk on Twitter.
@PeterMcGuireIE Yeah, that's fine- thanks for asking. I still don't think their answer was negative (as hopefully I made clear in my tweets)
@warrenswords @PTHosford I wouldn't risk the daily lottery tbh - you'd have to be there in person, wouldn't you? That's what happened in NY.

@Scullybones027 I don't understand what you mean?

@peterstafford @faduda @normcos Yes, I would see this as a strong step by the NUJ. I don't see what the union's actions thus far are doing.
@faduda ... have had their work stolen. In other words, acting on behalf of members against a threat to the industry.
